prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered nurturing pose with arms open in welcoming embrace, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating hexagonal lattice, dodecahedron patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and Flower of Life matrix emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals with elemental spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor ONIZIMP's profile: 'He who brings labor', Aethyr TOR, Earth element, Tarot The Empress, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Taurus, embodying the essence: 'In ONIZIMP's presence, one is stirred to industrious action the environment buzzes with motivating e...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered nurturing pose with arms open in welcoming embrace
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who brings labor'
profile_data.essence: In ONIZIMP's presence, one is stirred to industrious action the environment buzzes with motivating energy, making productivity feel natural and rewarding.
profile_data.angelic_role: Virtue of Forge of Industry; commands iron-winged legionaries.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic, angular form resembling an iron-forged geometric construct, representing the structural power of Earth and industrial precision. Fractalized edges suggest both rigidity and potential for transformation, embodying the Taurus archetype of potential energy.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Bronze symbolizes industrial strength and transformation, while earth-brown represents foundational stability. The shifting pattern reflects the dynamic nature of labor and creative potential.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Hexagonal structures echo sacred geometry of bee hives and molecular structures, representing collective labor. Dodecahedron symbolizes divine order and transformation from Platonic solids.
